Header: Police Sergeant acquitted from all charges over CPC shooting incident
Content: The Police Sergeant arrested in connection with the shooting incident which took place at the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation headquarters last year was released from all charges today. This was announced when the suspect who was attached to the security detail of Minister Arjuna Ranatunga was produced before Colombo Chief Magistrateâ€™s Court. The Criminal Investigations Department informed court that the Attorney General has issued instructions to refrain from taking further legal action against the suspect. Accordingly, Chief Magistrate had ordered the defendant to be released from all charges.
